verses.name: Hebrews 11:27
verses.text: By faith he forsook Egypt, not fearing the wrath of the king: for he endured, as seeing him who is invisible.

verses.name: Hebrews 11:28
verses.text: Through faith he kept the passover, and the sprinkling of blood, lest he that destroyed the firstborn should touch them.

verses.name: Hebrews 11:29
verses.text: By faith they passed through the Red sea as by dry land: which the Egyptians assaying to do were drowned.

verses.name: Hebrews 11:30
verses.text: By faith the walls of Jericho fell down, after they were compassed about seven days.

verses.name: Hebrews 11:31
verses.text: By faith the harlot Rahab perished not with them that believed not, when she had received the spies with peace.
